text.en: Orgyen Pema Jungne, embodiment of all the buddhas,
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün ngö orgyen pema jung

text.en: And Thangtong Gyalpo, lord of siddhas and builder of iron bridges,
Are indivisible from you, Chöying Dorje, Lord of Secrets.
I pray to you: dispel outer and inner obstacles!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so chi nang barché sol

text.en: Let me actualize clear light, the very nature of my mind,
text.en-trans: sem kyi rangzhin ösal ngön du gyur

text.en: Recognize all dharmas of deluded perception as dream-like,
text.en-trans: trulnang chö kün milam tabur tok

text.en: And perfect the realization of Cutting Through and Direct Crossing!
text.en-trans: trekchö tögal gongpa ta ru chin

text.en: Bless me, that I may spontaneously accomplish the twofold benefit!
text.en-trans: dön nyi lhün gyi drubpar jingyi lob
